name: LOVE IN ACTION MOMENT FOR THE POOR ORGANIZATION
briefDescription: Our Organization had many desires towards implementation of Social Services in various types. Therefore I beseech you with my cordial felicitations to be kind enough towards our proposed Social Services and offer your support for the fulfilment of Gods aspiration. Like famous adage “SERVICE TO HUMAN IS SERVICE TO GOD”. A benevolent heart compared with palace of almighty. For such people a reward with the crown of righteousness will be kept in store.
